en.content: The man looks up at the village, scanning the clifftops. You get a brief flash of his face. There is something unsettling about it. Then he turns to walk away from the road. But as he does, he raises a hand and slowly beckons to you.

zh.content: 这男人仰望村子的方向，视野扫过悬崖的顶部。一瞬间，你看到了他的脸。似乎有什么东西让你不安。然后他转过身，沿着路走远。但这时，他扬起一只手，慢慢地向你招手示意。
